pages.text: $(li)The Illager's Bane enchantment can be applied in a Sword or Axe.$(br)$(li)A weapon with this enchantment applied does additional damage to Illager Mobs like the Evoker, Furanter, or Black Iron Golem.
pages.title: Illager's Bane

pages.text: $(li)It can be upgraded until Level VIII and arrive the IX with the Ancient Tome.
